content: GF#20307 - I would think that it would be better to specify that iif() is short circuit evaluation. Not sure what the syntax would be otherwise. Whatever, we need to clean up the mystifying comment on iif()

I was thinking of an "if" expression in the language:
'if' expression 'then' expression 'else' expression
That way it can be parser-recognized
But I've proposed a disposition based on your suggestion: GF#20307
